renderpass.code:
#define S smoothstep
#define L( Y,t,A,B)                                \
     U.y -= Y,                                     \
     V = cos(t+vec2(0,11)),                        \
     a = A*V, b = (B-A)*V +.004*cos(60.*(iTime+Y)+vec2(0,11));  \
     O += S(3./R.y,0., length(U-a - b * clamp(dot(U-a, b) / dot(b, b), 0., 1.))); // adapted from https://www.shadertoy.com/view/llySRh

void mainImage( out vec4 O, vec2 u )
{
    vec2 R = iResolution.xy,
         U = ( u+u - R ) / R.y, V,a,b;
         
    U.y -= .3; V = U; V.y += .9;
    O = vec4(1,.6,.6,1) * S(3./R.y,0.,length(V)-.1)   // --- nose
                        * (.7-.3*sin(12.*(V.x-V.y))); // gradient
    
    if (U.y<.5 && U.y>-.75 ) {                        // --- hat
        float y = (U.y+.5) * .82, 
              v = y/4. - pow(y,8.); // .82 = pow(4.,-1./7.) 
        v = 16.*U.x/(.7+2.3*sqrt(max(0.,v)));         // profile. see https://www.desmos.com/calculator/71inwt2pzu

        O += (  .9 -.4*U.x                            // horizontal gradient
              + sin(4.*asin(1.-mod(v,2.)))*(-.5<U.y?.1:0.) // folds. see https://www.shadertoy.com/view/3dKczV and https://www.desmos.com/calculator/7cg0bhown0?
              + .3* S(.3,.5,U.y)                      // white top 
             )                         
            * clamp(1.-(abs(v)-5.7)/fwidth(v),0.,1.); // bottom +Â antialiased shape
    }
    
    U.x = abs(U.x);                                   // --- mustache
    L(-.93,-.1 ,.14,.95)
    L( .02, .05,.15,1. )
    L( .02, .3 ,.14,.9 )
    O += vec4(.04,.06,.36,1)*max(0.,1.-2.*O.w);       // background 
    
    O = sqrt(O);                                      // to sRGB
 }
renderpass.name: Image
